verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD הַֽ֭לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ye the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> [him] O ye servants יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

שֶׁ֣֭עֹֽמְדִים <S%H5975><s%> Ye that stand בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּ֝חַצְר֗וֹת <S%H2691><s%> in the courts בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God

הַֽ֭לְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָהּ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD זַמְּר֥וּ <S%H2167><s%> sing praises לִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹ <S%H8034><s%> unto his name כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נָעִֽים׃ <S%H5273><s%> for [it is] pleasant

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בָּחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen ל֣וֹ יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> For the LORD יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> unto himself [and] Israel לִסְגֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5459><s%> for his peculiar treasure

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> For I know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD וַ֝אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <S%H136><s%> our Lord מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> [is] above all gods

כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> pleased יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Whatsoever the LORD עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [that] did בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> he in heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in earth בַּ֝יַּמִּ֗ים <S%H3220><s%> in the seas וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> and all deep places

מַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> to ascend נְשִׂאִים֮ <S%H5387><s%> He causeth the vapours מִקְצֵ֪ה <S%H7097><s%> from the ends הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בְּרָקִ֣ים <S%H1300><s%> lightnings לַמָּטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> for the rain עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> he maketh מֽוֹצֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> he bringeth ר֝וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind מֵאֽוֹצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H214><s%> out of his treasuries

שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <S%H5221><s%> Who smote בְּכוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מֵ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> both of man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and beast

שָׁלַ֤ח ׀ <S%H7971><s%> [Who] sent אֹת֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> tokens וּ֭מֹפְתִים <S%H4159><s%> and wonders בְּתוֹכֵ֣כִי <S%H8432><s%> into the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of thee O Egypt בְּ֝פַרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> and upon all his servants
שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <S%H5221><s%> Who smote גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> great וְ֝הָרַ֗ג <S%H2026><s%> and slew מְלָכִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> kings עֲצוּמִֽים׃ <S%H6099><s%> mighty

לְסִיח֤וֹן ׀ <S%H5511><s%> Sihon מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites וּ֭לְעוֹג <S%H5747><s%> and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan וּ֝לְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> and all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> and all the kingdoms כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <S%H776><s%> their land נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> [for] an heritage נַ֝חֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> Thy name לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD זִכְרְךָ֥ <S%H2143><s%> [and] thy memorial לְדֹר־ <S%H1755><s%> throughout all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> will judge יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֲ֝בָדָ֗יו <S%H5650><s%> himself concerning his servants יִתְנֶחָֽם׃ <S%H5162><s%> and he will repent

עֲצַבֵּ֣י <S%H6091><s%> The idols הַ֭גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> hands אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men's

פֶּֽה־ <S%H6310><s%> They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <S%H5869><s%> not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> have they but they see

אָזְנַ֣יִם <S%H241><s%> They have ears לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <S%H238><s%> but they hear אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> all אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> Nor יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> not neither is there ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> [any] breath בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> in their mouths

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <S%H3644><s%> will be like יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> They that make כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> them everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house הַ֭לֵּוִי <S%H3878><s%> of Levi בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יִֽרְאֵ֥י <S%H3373><s%> ye that fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> be the LORD מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> out of Zion שֹׁ֘כֵ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> which dwelleth יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
